Phase 6.7 COMPLETE: Backend Services Stabilization - All 8/8 Healthy & Traefik Registered

MAJOR SUCCESS: Backend Analytics Services Fully Operational
============================================================

Successfully stabilized all 8 backend analytics services with port configuration
fixes, sequential rebuilds, and Traefik integration. All services now healthy and
accessible through API gateway.

Root Cause Fixed: Port Configuration Mismatch
- Services had hardcoded or inconsistent port configurations
- Healthchecks checking wrong ports causing persistent "unhealthy" status
- Traefik unable to discover services (0/8 â†’ 8/8 registered)

Solution: Standardize SERVICE_PORT Environment Variable
========================================================

Files Modified (8 Backend Services):
1. backend/portfolio_optimizer/app.py
   - Changed: os.environ.get(''SERVICE_PORT'', 5000)
   - Endpoint: /health
   - Traefik Route: /api/portfolio

2. backend/rl_trading/app.py
   - Changed: Updated health endpoint and port configuration
   - Endpoint: /health
   - Traefik Route: /api/rl

3. backend/advanced_backtest/app.py
   - Changed: Standardized port to SERVICE_PORT
   - Endpoint: /api/health
   - Traefik Route: /api/backtest

4. backend/factor_models/app.py
   - Changed: Standardized port configuration
   - Endpoint: /api/health
   - Traefik Route: /api/factors

5. backend/stock_screener/app.py
   - Changed: Standardized port to SERVICE_PORT
   - Endpoint: /health
   - Traefik Route: /api/screener|alpha|regime

6. backend/simulation_engine/config.py
   - Changed: SIMULATION_PORT â†’ SERVICE_PORT
   - Traefik Route: /api/simulation

7. backend/fractional_diff/config.py
   - Changed: FRACDIFF_PORT â†’ SERVICE_PORT
   - Traefik Route: /api/fracdiff

8. backend/meta_labeling/config.py
   - Changed: Added os.getenv(''SERVICE_PORT'', 5000)
   - Traefik Route: /api/metalabel

Build Strategy: Sequential Instead of Parallel
===============================================
- Previous Approach: Build all 8 in parallel (5+ minutes, still running)
- New Approach: Build sequentially (30 seconds total, all cached)
- Result: 10x faster builds leveraging Docker cache
